description: Lists the budgets that are associated with an account.

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The accountId that is associated with the budgets that you want to describe.

nested_items.name: Budgets
nested_items.description: A list of budgets.

nested_items.name: BudgetName
nested_items.description: The name of a budget. The name must be unique within an account. The : and \ characters, and the '/action/' substring, aren't allowed in BudgetName.

nested_items.name: BudgetLimit
nested_items.description: The total amount of cost, usage, RI utilization, RI coverage, Savings Plans utilization, or Savings Plans coverage that you want to track with your budget.

nested_items.name: Amount
nested_items.description: The cost or usage amount that's associated with a budget forecast, actual spend, or budget threshold.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The unit of measurement that's used for the budget forecast, actual spend, or budget threshold.

nested_items.name: PlannedBudgetLimits
nested_items.description: A map containing multiple BudgetLimit, including current or future limits.

nested_items.name: Amount
nested_items.description: (string) ---
An Amount of 3
A Unit of USD.

nested_items.name: CostFilters
nested_items.description: The cost filters, such as Region, Service, LinkedAccount, Tag, or CostCategory, that are applied to a budget.
Amazon EC2
Amazon Redshift.
Amazon Relational Database Service.
Amazon ElastiCache.
Amazon OpenSearch Service.

nested_items.name: CostTypes
nested_items.description: The types of costs that are included in this COST budget.

nested_items.name: IncludeTax
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a budget includes taxes.

nested_items.name: IncludeSubscription
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a budget includes subscriptions.

nested_items.name: UseBlended
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a budget uses a blended rate.

nested_items.name: IncludeRefund
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a budget includes refunds.

nested_items.name: IncludeCredit
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a budget includes credits.

nested_items.name: IncludeUpfront
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a budget includes upfront RI costs.

nested_items.name: IncludeRecurring
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a budget includes recurring fees such as monthly RI fees.

nested_items.name: IncludeOtherSubscription
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a budget includes non-RI subscription costs.

nested_items.name: IncludeSupport
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a budget includes support subscription fees.

nested_items.name: IncludeDiscount
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a budget includes discounts.

nested_items.name: UseAmortized
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a budget uses the amortized rate.

nested_items.name: TimeUnit
nested_items.description: The length of time until a budget resets the actual and forecasted spend.

nested_items.name: TimePeriod
nested_items.description: The period of time that's covered by a budget. You set the start date and end date. The start date must come before the end date. The end date must come before 06/15/87 00:00 UTC.

nested_items.name: Start
nested_items.description: The start date for a budget. If you created your budget and didn't specify a start date, Amazon Web Services defaults to the start of your chosen time period (DAILY, MONTHLY, QUARTERLY, or ANNUALLY). For example, if you created your budget on January 24, 2018, chose DAILY, and didn't set a start date, Amazon Web Services set your start date to 01/24/18 00:00 UTC. If you chose MONTHLY, Amazon Web Services set your start date to 01/01/18 00:00 UTC. The defaults are the same for the Billing and Cost Management console and the API.

nested_items.name: End
nested_items.description: The end date for a budget. If you didn't specify an end date, Amazon Web Services set your end date to 06/15/87 00:00 UTC. The defaults are the same for the Billing and Cost Management console and the API.

nested_items.name: CalculatedSpend
nested_items.description: The actual and forecasted cost or usage that the budget tracks.

nested_items.name: ActualSpend
nested_items.description: The amount of cost, usage, RI units, or Savings Plans units that you used.

nested_items.name: Amount
nested_items.description: The cost or usage amount that's associated with a budget forecast, actual spend, or budget threshold.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The unit of measurement that's used for the budget forecast, actual spend, or budget threshold.

nested_items.name: ForecastedSpend
nested_items.description: The amount of cost, usage, RI units, or Savings Plans units that you're forecasted to use.

nested_items.name: Amount
nested_items.description: The cost or usage amount that's associated with a budget forecast, actual spend, or budget threshold.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The unit of measurement that's used for the budget forecast, actual spend, or budget threshold.

nested_items.name: BudgetType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether this budget tracks costs, usage, RI utilization, RI coverage, Savings Plans utilization, or Savings Plans coverage.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The last time that you updated this budget.

nested_items.name: AutoAdjustData
nested_items.description: The parameters that determine the budget amount for an auto-adjusting budget.

nested_items.name: AutoAdjustType
nested_items.description: The string that defines whether your budget auto-adjusts based on historical or forecasted data.

nested_items.name: HistoricalOptions
nested_items.description: The parameters that define or describe the historical data that your auto-adjusting budget is based on.

nested_items.name: BudgetAdjustmentPeriod
nested_items.description: The number of budget periods included in the moving-average calculation that determines your auto-adjusted budget amount. The maximum value depends on the TimeUnit granularity of the budget:
For the DAILY granularity, the maximum value is 60.
For the MONTHLY granularity, the maximum value is 12.
For the QUARTERLY granularity, the maximum value is 4.
For the ANNUALLY granularity, the maximum value is 1.

nested_items.name: LookBackAvailablePeriods
nested_items.description: The integer that describes how many budget periods in your BudgetAdjustmentPeriod are included in the calculation of your current BudgetLimit. If the first budget period in your BudgetAdjustmentPeriod has no cost data, then that budget period isn't included in the average that determines your budget limit.

nested_items.name: LastAutoAdjustTime
nested_items.description: The last time that your budget was auto-adjusted.

nested_items.name: FilterExpression
nested_items.description: The filtering dimensions for the budget and their corresponding values.

nested_items.name: Or
nested_items.description: Return results that match either Dimension object.

nested_items.name: And
nested_items.description: Return results that match both Dimension objects.

nested_items.name: Dimensions
nested_items.description: The specific Dimension to use for Expression.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The name of the dimension that you want to filter on.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The metadata values you can specify to filter upon, so that the results all match at least one of the specified values.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MatchOptions
nested_items.description: The match options that you can use to filter your results. You can specify only one of these values in the array.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key for the tag.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The specific value of the tag.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MatchOptions
nested_items.description: The match options that you can use to filter your results.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CostCategories
nested_items.description: The filter that's based on CostCategoryValues.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The unique name of the cost category.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The specific value of the cost category.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MatchOptions
nested_items.description: The match options that you can use to filter your results.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Metrics
nested_items.description: The definition for how the budget data is aggregated.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token in the service response that indicates the next set of results that you can retrieve.
